name: Arctic Wind
description: Envelop yourself in winter winds, instantly healing for 3305 Health and an additional 413 Health every 1 second over 5 seconds. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  While the effect persists the winds pulse outwards, dealing 434 Frost Damage every 1 second to nearby enemies.
coefDescription: Envelop yourself in winter winds, instantly healing for $1 Health and an additional $2 Health every 1 second over 5 seconds. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  While the effect persists the winds pulse outwards, dealing $3 Frost Damage every 1 second to nearby enemies.
